Bulk RNA Deconvolution with MuSiC

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Bulk RNA Deconvolution with MuSiC](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/single-cell/tutorials/bulk-music/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
